moderate.html: Donâ€™t overdo it if you are an adult or child with a lung or heart problem.

high.html: Take your inhaler with you if you have a respiratory condition.
Reduce hard physical activity if you are an adult or child with a lung or heart problem.
If you are older, reduce physical activity.

very_high.html: Take your inhaler with you if you have a respiratory condition.
Avoid hard physical activity if you are older, have lung problems, or have heart problems.
If you experience any symptoms, reduce your physical exertion.

moderate.html: Stay inside to reduce your exposure to pollen.
Wear a face mask, wraparound glasses and change your clothes after being outside.

high.html: Stay inside to reduce your exposure to pollen.
Wear a face mask, wraparound glasses and change your clothes after being outside.

very_high.html: Stay inside to reduce your exposure to pollen.
Wear a face mask, wraparound glasses and change your clothes after being outside.
